added.change: KaTeX is now bundled with the executable, allowing hashcards to work entirely offline.

changed.change: Cards are shuffled randomly at the start of a session.

fixed.change: Fix a bug where the card cache was not cleared on undo. See [PR #57](https://github.com/eudoxia0/hashcards/pull/57).

added.change: Deck files accept TOML frontmatter, so you can override the inferred deck name.
The session completed page shows a button to shut down the server.
Flashcards can be separated using `---` as an explicit separator.

changed.change: Killing the server with `ctrl+c` at the end of a session causes the server to die with exit code 0.
SQLite is once again bundled into the binary, increasing the executable size but reducing build problems especially on NixOS.

added.change: The `macros.tex` file now supports comments: lines starting with `%` are ignored.
Add CSS to render `blockquote` elements in a grey box.
The `drill` and `check` commands now validate that images/audio files referenced in flashcards actually exist.

changed.change: The UI now works on small and mobile viewports.

fixed.change: Fixed a bug where exclamation marks broke the parsing of Cloze deletions. See [issue 29](https://github.com/eudoxia0/hashcards/issues/29).

changed.change: SQLite is no longer bundled into the binary, reducing the executable size.
